summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1909, for the improvement of Sixteenth Avenue Northwest, Seventeenth Avenue Northwest and Eighteenth Avenue Northwest each from West Sixty-fifth Street to West Seventy-fifth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein or proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary wyes, manholes, lampholes, catch basins, inlets and other appurtenances; under Ordinance No. 19662, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
